price: 49.Qhuraanak Naayootaa kee Nabii Mucammad ﷺ Numma tascasse astooti dirabboyse mari Qhiyaamah ayró digaala ken xagele Yallih amri cinak sugeenimih Sabbatah.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā yamassuhumu al-ʿadhābu bimā kānū yafsuqūna
